details.point: Maintain and contribute to team's Particle Filter, Holonomic Time Optimized Autonomous Path Planner, Yearly Robot Control Software based on yearly needs.
Utilize computer vision and environmental sensors (color, beam break, optical, etc.) to enhance robot capabilities, navigation, and autonomous capabilities.

Direct development and maintainance of novel application to efficiently collect and insightfully visualize high volumes of competition data, enhancing strategic decision-making and competitive performance.

Contribute to and utilize ubiquitous FRC tools: TheBlueAlliance, a data insight platform encompassing data from all global FRC events, and WPILIB, a comprehensive framework for robot development and control
Lead subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of team robot and train new members to contribute to robot development.
4th ranked team in California, 12th out of 9000+ total teams; World Championship Division and Two California Regional Event Winning Team (2024)
Highly selective 4 week UCLA Neurology and AI Summer Program (<4.6% acceptance rate.)
Started program without any prior knowledge, created and optimized numerous architectures (Synaptic Integration, MLPs, CNNs, AlexNet, VAEs, RL Model) for given use cases.

Rapidly developed comprehensive understanding of fundamenal machine learning principles: transformers, recurrent networks, advanced regression, reinforcement learning, convolutional models, advanced training optimization.
